subtitle: This country pie is just as delicious if served hot or cold and is perfect for picnics.

method.text: Preheat oven to 200°C. Lightly grease a 20 cm spring-clip cake tin.
Put the minced turkey into a large bowl. Reserving 10 ml of beaten egg, add all remaining ingredients to the bowl. Mix thoroughly.

Roll out two-thirds of the pastry to a diameter of approximately 37 cm round. Fold in half then place inside the cake tin. Unfold the pastry and press into the tin. Spoon the turkey mixture into the pastry case, levelling the top.
Roll out the remaining third of pastry. Dampen the inside edge and fit onto the top of the pie. Trim the edge. Seal in a decorative way.
Brush the top with the reserved egg. Use the pastry trimmings to make decorations on the top. Pierce a hole in the centre.
Place in the oven for 20 min.
Reduce temperature to 180°C. Cook for a further 40 min.
Allow to cool in the tin before removing. Serve hot or cold.

title: Country turkey pie
